attributes.action: Remove Yvette Cooper from public office for mis-representing her constituent
attributes.additional_details: In 2016, the nation took part in the biggest show of democracy in the modern era, and the Normanton, Pontefract and Castleford constituency voted to leave the EU, with 60% of this area saying out. Yvette Cooper blocks any attempt by the government to secure a good Brexit, and tabled a motion that restricts spending on no-deal preparations. She is undermining her constituents and abusing her power, as well as the integrity of the UKs democracy.
attributes.background: Yvette Cooper, the MP for the Normanton, Castleford and Pontefract constitutency continuously votes against the government and restricts any attempt of securing a good Brexit, despite her constituency voting overwhelmingly to leave the EU in 2016.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it is not something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

The selection of parliamentary candidates is the responsibility of their political party.
